text: Kevin McKidd (born 9 August 1973) is a Scottish actor. He has played many acting roles such as Lucius Vorenus on Rome, as Dan Vasser on Journeyman, as Poseidon on Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief, and as Dr. Owen Hunt on Grey's Anatomy. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:People from Moray
title: Kevin McKidd
